TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi abstract sealed beforefieldinit ADClientErrorExtensions extends System.Object

Docs.summary: Extension methods for the iAd.ADClientError enumeration.

remarks.para: The extension method for the iAd.ADClientError enumeration can be used to fetch the error domain associated with these error codes.

MemberSignature.Value: public static Foundation.NSString GetDomain (this iAd.ADClientError self);
.method public static hidebysig class Foundation.NSString GetDomain(valuetype iAd.ADClientError self) cil managed

Docs.summary: Returns the error domain associated with the iAd.ADClientError value

remarks.para: See the for information on how to use the error domains when reporting errors.
